title: Programming
content:
Essential Programming Skills

Proficiency with essential tools for implementing the algorithms from your paper collection:

  • Python: Core language for implementing ML algorithms
  • Data Manipulation: NumPy, Pandas for efficient data handling
  • ML Libraries: TensorFlow, PyTorch for neural networks; scikit-learn for traditional algorithms

CS229 Programming Approaches

Implementation strategies for the core algorithms covered in the Stanford course, focusing on vectorization and computational efficiency.

Reproducibility

Tools and practices for reproducing results from your ML paper collection.
